Mostly, because of my inexperience of unit testing, this is my first time.

The light bulb above my head clicked on, when Vladimir replied earlier.

I mis-understood the use of setup & teardown, thinking they were run per
testcase class, not per tested method. Needless to say I re-read the JUnit
FAQ again.

From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbr@...]
Sent: 11 February 2003 20:55
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [junit] Suggestion: New addition to the Assert class


A question: why not do that clean up in tearDown()?

So said  Andrew McDonagh  on  2/11/2003 --------------------
